AUGUSTA, Maine —The Maine Center for Disease Control and Prevention is reporting 346 new cases of COVID-19, the highest one-day increase in Maine so far.

articles.author: Caitlin Owens
articles.title: Nursing homes are still getting pummeled by the pandemic - Axios
articles.description: Cases in nursing homes grew by more than 177% between mid-September and mid-November.
articles.content:
The U.S. has gotten no better at keeping the coronavirus out of nursing homes.
